00052 #ifndef PROTOCOLDEFINITIONS_HPP
00053 #define PROTOCOLDEFINITIONS_HPP

00056 //Opcodes of all TMCL commands that can be used in direct mode
00057 typedef enum TMCLCommandNumber {
00058   ROR = 1,  //Rotate right
00059   ROL = 2,  //Rotate left
00060   MST = 3,  //Motor stop
00061   MVP = 4,  //Move to position
00062   SAP = 5,  //Set axis parameter
00063   GAP = 6,  //Get axis parameter
00064   STAP = 7, //Store axis parameter into EEPROM
00065   RSAP = 8, //Restore axis parameter from EEPROM
00066   SGP = 9,  //Set global parameter
00067   GGP = 10, //Get global parameter
00068   STGP = 11, //Store global parameter into EEPROM
00069   RSGP = 12, //Restore global parameter from EEPROM
00070   RFS = 13,
00071   SIO = 14,
00072   GIO = 15,
00073   SCO = 30,
00074   GCO = 31,
00075   CCO = 32,
00076   FIRMWARE_VERSION = 136
00077 } CommandNumber;
00078 
00079 #define USER_VARIABLE_BANK 2
00080 
00081 //Opcodes of TMCL control functions (to be used to run or abort a TMCL program in the module)
00082 #define TMCL_APPL_STOP 128
00083 #define TMCL_APPL_RUN 129
00084 #define TMCL_APPL_RESET 131
00085 
00086 //Options for MVP commandds
00087 #define MVP_ABS 0
00088 #define MVP_REL 1
00089 #define MVP_COORD 2
00090 
00091 //Options for RFS command
00092 #define RFS_START 0
00093 #define RFS_STOP 1
00094 #define RFS_STATUS 2
00095 
00096 //Result codes for GetResult
00097 #define TMCL_RESULT_OK 0
00098 #define TMCL_RESULT_NOT_READY 1
00099 #define TMCL_RESULT_CHECKSUM_ERROR 2
